attributes.action: Keep Channel 4 as a publicly owned organisation.
attributes.additional_details: Keeping Channel 4 publicly owned would allow the associated production companies and creative industries across the country to continue to make award-winning broadcasting that is available on a free to air channel.
attributes.background: Stop the planned sale of Channel 4.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
